meanings.definition: The quality or state of being imitative.
meanings.sent1: Her imitativenesses in acting made her a great performer.
meanings.sent2: His imitativenesses of his favorite singer was spot on.
meanings.sent3: The imitativenesses of the parrot entertained the guests at the party.
meanings.sent4: The imitativenesses of the artist's brush captured the essence of the landscape.
meanings.sent5: The child's imitativenesses of his parents' mannerisms was endearing.

meanings.definition: The tendency to copy or mimic others.
meanings.sent1: The imitativenesses of the students in the class made learning fun.
meanings.sent2: Her imitativenesses of her friend's fashion sense was flattering.
meanings.sent3: The imitativenesses of the dog trying to meow was hilarious.
meanings.sent4: His imitativenesses of a chameleon blending into its surroundings was impressive.
meanings.sent5: The imitativenesses of the toddler copying dance moves was adorable.
